Uses of Package
com.qrmedia.commons.multispi.provider

Packages that use com.qrmedia.commons.multispi.provider
com.qrmedia.commons.multispi MultiSPI aims to make it easy to detect and load SPI implementations within applications that provide an SPI easy to apply tailored validation and error checking strategies for implementations easy to extend the number of ways by which SPI implementors can provide implementations. 
com.qrmedia.commons.multispi.config   
com.qrmedia.commons.multispi.provider   
 

Classes in com.qrmedia.commons.multispi.provider used by com.qrmedia.commons.multispi
ServiceImplementationProvider
          Finds implementations of a service interface or abstract class.
 

Classes in com.qrmedia.commons.multispi.provider used by com.qrmedia.commons.multispi.config
ServiceImplementationProvider
          Finds implementations of a service interface or abstract class.
 

Classes in com.qrmedia.commons.multispi.provider used by com.qrmedia.commons.multispi.provider
ClasspathResourcesReadingProvider
          A ResourceIoPerformingProvider that reads all resources of a specified name (as returned by ClassLoader.getResources(String) and combines the results from processing each one.
ClasspathResourcesReadingProvider.IoFunction
           
ManifestEntryProvider
          A ServiceImplementationProvider that returns implementations listed in a Java Manifest file, based on properties of the implementation's manifest entry.
ManifestProvider
          A ServiceImplementationProvider that returns implementations listed in a Java Manifest file, based on properties of the manifest.
ResourceIoPerformingProvider
          A ServiceImplementationProvider that performs file I/O and potentially throws exceptions.
ServiceImplementationProvider
          Finds implementations of a service interface or abstract class.
